entities.description: The various labeled categories for responses in the survey.
The frequency of responses in a specific category without any weight adjustments.
The percentage of respondents who fall into a specific response category.
Data entries that are missing or not provided.
Total number of responses in the survey data.
Various statistical measures such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.

relationships.description: Associates the frequency of responses to each category.
Associates the percentage of responses to each category.
Identifies the data entries that are missing within the survey.
Indicates the total number of responses recorded in the survey.
Describes the survey data using various statistical measures.
